description.title: What is Image Converter?
description.text: Image Converter is a free, secure online tool that allows you to convert images between popular formats like PNG, JPG, WebP, and GIF directly in your browser. Unlike other converters that require you to upload your files to a server, our tool processes everything locally on your device using advanced browser technologies. This ensures maximum privacy and speed, as your photos never leave your computer or phone.

howTo.title: How to Use Image Converter
steps: Drag and drop your image file into the box or click to select one
Choose your desired output format (PNG, JPG, WebP, etc.)
Adjust the quality slider if you're converting to JPG or WebP
Click 'Download Converted Image' to save the new file instantly

questions.q: Is it safe to convert private photos?
questions.a: Yes, absolutely. Since the conversion happens entirely within your browser, your images are never uploaded to any server. Your privacy is guaranteed.
It depends on the format and settings you choose. Converting to PNG is lossless (no quality loss). For JPG and WebP, you can adjust the quality slider to balance file size and image clarity.

questions.q: Can I convert multiple images at once?
questions.a: Currently, we focus on converting one image at a time with maximum precision. Batch conversion features are planned for future updates.

WebP is a modern image format that provides superior compression for images on the web. It often creates smaller file sizes than JPG or PNG while maintaining high quality, making your websites load faster.
